Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Del Nido Cardioplegia in Cardiac Surgery

Intervention.evidence: Patients were divided into two groups based on aortic cross-clamp (ACC) duration: 60–90 minutes (Group A, n=240) and >90 minutes (Group B, n=231).

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was postoperative troponin I levels, measured within 24 hours.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Patients were divided into two groups based on aortic cross-clamp (ACC) duration: 60–90 minutes (Group A, n=240) and >90 minutes (Group B, n=231).

Result_Outcome.evidence: Group B showed significantly higher troponin I levels (mean difference = 0.27, p<0.05)
